ingredients: 3 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil (neutral flavor – not sesame or olive)
4 Teaspoons Fish Sauce (Nam Pla) Use soy sauce for vegetarian recipes or as a substitute
1/2 Cup Firm Tofu (cut into 1/2 inch strips)
12 Medium Sized Shrimp, Washed and De-veined (optional)
Lime Wedges and Bean Sprouts as a Garnish
Lime Wedges and Bean Sprouts as a Garnish
